name: ruv-swarm
description: High-performance neural network swarm orchestration in WebAssembly

scripts.build:wasm-simd: cd ../crates/ruv-swarm-wasm && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../npm/wasm-simd -- --no-default-features
scripts.build:wasm-opt: cd ../crates/ruv-swarm-wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../npm/wasm-opt -- --features minimal && wasm-opt -Oz -o ../../npm/wasm-opt/ruv_swarm_wasm_bg.wasm ../../npm/wasm-opt/ruv_swarm_wasm_bg.wasm
scripts.build:all: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:wasm-simd && npm run build

author: rUv Contributors
